Demos need not be produced, a vocal over a piano is fine. If you have a produced track we'll listen to that too, but it is certainly not a requirement.
- Tim White - Producer/CEO - TALUS

opportunities.name: Song Critiques & Career Coaching From Reggie Calloway
opportunities.request_description:
Song Critiques & Career Coaching From Reggie CallowayReggie Calloway is eager to offer you his ear, taste, and professional criteria to make your music better, more adapted to what the industry is currently seeking, and general songwriting advice.

Additionally, and based on the questions you ask in the submission message space, Reggie will answer specific questions about your career path and strategy.

The five time Grammy-nominated Reggie Calloway has always displayed a unique ear for music and trends. It is no surprise that the music pioneer received a Grammy nomination for R&B Songwriter of the Year for the hit song “Casanova” in 1987.

Best known as the founder and leader of one of the most popular Techno-funk bands, Midnight Star, Calloway led the group to international success by writing, producing and arranging a string of top mega #1 hits including, “Operator,” “No Parking On The Dance Floor,” “I Wanna Be Rich” and “Freak-a-zoid.”

One of Calloway’s original compositions entitled, “I’ll Be Good For You,” was featured on N’Sync’s multi-platinum CD, No Strings Attached (highest selling album of the last decade). He has also penned songs for the chart-topping group Levert (“Casanova”), the sultry Teddy Pendergrass (“Joy”), Grammy-winning Gladys Knight (“Love Overboard”) and “Jump Start My Love” for Natalie Cole.

opportunities.request_description:
Record & Film with Wreckroom Records - Adrian Grenier's Music IncubatorWhen actor/entrepreneur Adrian Grenier built a recording studio in his Brooklyn home's basement, his intentions were simple: create a space for friends to write, perform, and record music. However, the equipped studio (appropriately dubbed the WRECKROOM) has evolved, becoming a breeding ground for fresh talent -- a music incubator. 

The Wreckroom seeks to develop and promote artists who are pushing creative boundaries. Artists are vetted by Grenier and his team: Damien Paris, Mike Frankel, and Brian Koerber. Selected musicians join the team for a full day session, in which they professionally record an original song and film a live-style music video.

opportunities.name: Get a one-hour video/phone consultation & coaching session with Steve Tramposch, Platinum A&R, Manager, & Producer
opportunities.request_description:
Is your career ready for the next big step? Get a one-hour phone consultation & coaching session with Steve Tramposch, Platinum A&R, Manager, & ProducerIs your career ready for the next big step? 

If you're looking to get signed and become famous (or even just improve your game), then you owe it to yourself to stop what you're doing right now. 

Steve Tramposch has been a Senior A&R exec for some of the world’s largest record and music companies, including Capitol, Virgin, Elektra, Eleven Seven, Billboard, and more. 

He’s been doing this for over 20 years, and in that time, he’s been instrumental in the early discovery of artists that have sold tens of millions of records. Rock, Pop, Alternative, Rap, R&B, Singer-Songwriter, Country, Indie, you name it. 

He was responsible for signing Nothing More, Red Jumpsuit Apparatus, The Format, and many, many more, and you can be next. 

Forget blindly sending in music, waiting on long audition lines, or companies that promise they’ll send it to someone like Steve if they think you’re good enough. 

Steve’s going to personally consult with you and give you the FAST TRACK ROUTE to achieving your dreams. 

On any given day Steve is working with any number of artists and companies, fielding offers in a large number of different capacities – record, publishing, TV/film, tours, endorsements, you name it. 

When you submit your music, send as much information as possible including links to social profiles, lyrics, social stats, touring stats, etc. 

Thanks for visiting, click "Submit to this Opportunity" and let's get started. 

Hope to hear from you, see you inside.

opportunities.name: Professional Song Critique: Emmy Sound - The SoundBeat
opportunities.request_description:
Professional Song Critique: Emmy Sound - The SoundBeatI looking forward to hearing your original tunes and to finding the diamonds in the rough! Please submit your song(s) for a critique.

I am looking to both critique artists as well as find new talent. If your music is great I will present it to The SoundBeat for possible distribution. We are always looking for new good talent. Since we are a subsidiary of Sony Music there are endless opportunities for me to present an artist that has real talent.

I believe in developing relationships and making connections. When I work with you I begin by finding out about you, what you like, and where you've been. I learn who your favorite artists are, who inspires you, what entertains you or brings you joy. Always authentic I speak to you on a human level and share freely about lessons and tips I've learned along the way. I've been at The SoundBeat corp for the past 8 years. Before that I worked at Polygram Classics & Jazz, as well as Rolling Stone Magazine. I feel lucky every day that I can work with what I love - music & people - and I don't have to wear a suit!

- Emmy Sound / The Sound Beat (Sound Beat Music Entertainment)

In need of written materialRecord label looking for songwriters for one of our female vocalists. L7 Music Group is a worldwide digital distribution, publishing and licensing company that strives to take indie artists, from all genres, to the next level. We were founded in February 2017 with over 40 years of hands-on experience in the music industry, collectively. Our growing company excels in getting artists’ music to the masses and getting them paid for their musical works. Unlike most distribution services, we do not charge a fee to distribute with our company. Instead, we split the profits with our artists 80-20, with the artist taking the lion’s share of the profits from their music. We distribute to over 250 downloading & streaming markets and have an 85% success rate on getting artists music in rotation on Pandora. We realize that times have changed and that the method of hand-to-hand CD sells is slowing diminishing, so we've decided to assist artists in building an online presence by offering our services to those artists who really want to be heard, foreign and domestic.- Geoffrey Domingues -
CEO - L7 Music Group

opportunities.name: New Soul, Old Soul, songs for Major Films and TV Shows ASAP!
opportunities.request_description:
New Soul, Old Soul, songs for Major Films and TV Shows ASAP!Soul Songs in all styles, TV Shows, and Films. On networks such as Sony Pictures, FOX, CBS, NBC Universal, ABC, Lions Gate, Paramount, Warner Bros, etc. We have a "Huge" track record of placing music with these entities! We have music in "King Of Staten Island", "Once Upon In Hollywood",  "Shape Of Water" and 1000's of more Major Films and TV Shows!!  Join the Music Of The Sea Revolution!

If you sign with Music Of The Sea your music will be part of NBC/UNI, CBS Television, Vice, Omnicom system networks upon signing with us. We have deals with these Major Networks.

Because of the "High Profile Major Artists" in our catalog such as Beyonce, Janet Jackson, Chaka Khan, Bill Withers, Chic, Ojays, Sunshine Anderson, Dionne Farris, Kool and The Gang, etc, they are looking to use the "Music Of The Sea" brand and artist!

We have the attention of many major networks and they want to use the artist and composers from our catalog! Have your song/tracks along ride along side the major artist in our catalog and grow your brand!!! "High Quality" tracks only, no exceptions! No Demos and unmastered tracks, no uncleared samples. You must have clean versions available, and you must own master and publishing rights! Huge opportunity!

If you have music in our catalog, your music is automatically being considered.

- Eddie Sea / Music Of The Sea

Why the higher than average submission fee?

Often we hear music that doesn’t make the final cut for a particular opportunity but we go ahead and select the song anyway because we believe the song is appropriate for other opportunities we’re working on. Here at Music of The Sea, we fill dozens of sync requests every week. We don’t have time to listen to everything so the higher submission fee tends to discourage all but the best - and we sign a lot of music and we place almost all of it.

We only offer one deal and the terms are the same for everyone, so don’t submit if you’re seeking another type of deal. If we select your song, you give us exclusive rights to the song for 3 years. If after three years we haven’t licensed your song, the rights revert back to you. If we do license your song, we share in the revenue. Often, if we love the song we hear and want to work with you we will also have interest in hearing other songs in your catalog and possibly doing a broader deal.

opportunities.name: Emotive Cinematic Electronic & Orchestral Music Needed (£50-£1000 per use)
opportunities.request_description:
Emotive Cinematic Electronic & Orchestral Music Needed (£50-£1000 per use) Seeking emotive and uplifting Cinematic music for use in documentaries, film and TV/Streaming. 

Music must be original, well produced, mixed and mastered. Instrumental music preferred please, but great vocals welcome (please make sure you can supply instrumental version as well) and all tempos / emotions and genres required from electronica to big orchestral. 

Artists must control all rights to their music 100% on both sides (master & publishing) and there must be no copyright infringement.  

Selected tracks will be cleared into our catalogue, pro-actively pitched to sync opportunities and made available for existing clients to use in their projects. Clients are professional film makers, video production companies, indie film makers, games developers and advertising agencies that make high-end film content. 

Music used by clients will be licensed on a non-exclusive basis (so you maintain all rights to your music), we simply go 50-50 on deals we get for you, you’re paid quarterly and artists keep 100% of all royalties generated from placements. 
 
Artist's will receive between £50-£1,000 per track depending on use, size of project etc, and music will be made available for other suitable licensing opportunities. So, if you have any amazing cinematic music, I’d really love to hear from you! 

NB; If you have already submitted and had music accepted into our catalogue that is suitable for this brief, you don’t need to re-submit as your music will automatically be pitched to our clients! 

Looking forward to hearing your music and working with you :) 
 
All the best, 
Giles Gale 

Music Supervisor

opportunities.name: EDM, D’n’B, Dubstep and Dance tracks Needed
opportunities.request_description:
EDM, D’n’B, Dubstep and Dance tracks Needed (£50-£1000+ per use) Seeking EDM, DnB, Dubstep and Dance Music suitable for use in advertising, online videos, documentaries, films and TV/Streaming. 

Music must be original, well produced, mixed and mastered. Instrumental music preferred please, but great vocals welcome (but please make sure you can supply instrumental versions of vocal tracks) and all tempos, emotions required from experimental beats to club bangers. 

Artists must own/control all rights to their music 100% on both sides (master & publishing) and there must be no copyright infringement.  

Selected tracks will be cleared into our catalogue, made available for existing clients to use in their projects and pro-actively pitched to sync opportunities. Clients are professional film makers, video production companies, games developers, advertising agencies etc, that produce high-end content. 

Music used by clients will be licensed on a non-exclusive basis (so you maintain all rights to your music), simply go 50-50 on deals we get for you, you’re paid quarterly and keep 100% of all royalties generated from placements. 
 
Artist's will receive between £50-£1,000+ per track depending on use, type of project etc, and music will be available for all licensing opportunities. So, if you have any amazing Dance music tracks, I’d really love to hear from you! 

NB; If you have already had music accepted into our catalogue that is suitable for this brief, you don’t need to re-submit as your music will automatically be pitched to our clients as well! Thanks! 

Looking forward to hearing your music and working with you :) 
 
All the best, 
Giles Gale 

Music Supervisor

opportunities.name: Looking for Artists to Manage
opportunities.request_description:
Looking for Artists to Manage John Guerrier De'Bey is looking to sign artists to him directly for management. 

Artists should have songs recorded or at least have access to record demos and catalog recordings. 

Requirements for management:
1.) Must be performing at least twice a month
2.) Must have been compensated for your work in any capacity
3.) Must have full clearance or ability to clear your musical works
4.) Must not currently be signed to any other music manager
5.) Professional Photos 

Please submit your best. 

In return I will be using your resources to better place your music with record labels, film studios via licensing, touring, paid gigs and more. This is a true relationship that takes time to build. I will guide you to better achieve your goals for a more prosperous career.

Sincerely,
John
 
- John is truly passionate and well advised on all aspects of music. John has served as president and executive for several independent labels with Major distribution (UMG, SONY, WARNER) managed record labels, A&R's, Recording Artists and business ventures for Independent and Major Record Labels

- John Guerrier De Bey -
Manager - De'Bey

opportunities.name: Professional Song & Production Critique - Betsy Walter, Circle of Song-Buckhold Music
opportunities.request_description:
Professional Song & Production Critique - Betsy Walter, Circle of Song-Buckhold MusicPlease submit your song for review & detailed critique on lyric, melody and production by professional Nashville songwriter/producer Betsy Walter at Circle of Song-Buckhold Music. Betsy will give you straight up, honest feedback on your song, in its worktape or rough demo form, and/or your production, on your rough demo, initial mix, final mix master, etc. She will make production suggestions as well and may offer to produce your final recording. Suggestions and ideas are provided to improve your piece of music and feedback is given on multiple aspects of your song and production. All genres are acceptable, as Betsy Walter is a multi-genre producer/songwriter with songs in pop, jazz, R&B, country, soul, adult contemporary, gospel, bluegrass, rock and Americana. 

Betsy Walter is a Billboard-charting producer, award-winning music industry professional and former major record label executive producer with an extensive network of A-List music industry talent, producers and executives, including Grammy winners, Emmy-nominated composers and multi-platinum selling artists, producers & songwriters. She has extensive working knowledge and experience in the craft and business of songwriting and record production and is looking forward to hearing your art and talent!
- Betsy Walter -
Owner - Circle of Song-Buckhold Music

opportunities.name: Seeking Trailer Friendly Material for Sync Placements
opportunities.request_description:
Seeking Trailer Friendly Material for Sync PlacementsWe are looking for more “trailer friendly” material to add to our catalog for licensing. We are seeking songs that could work for film trailers and TV ads. There are no genre restrictions, as long as the songs are percussive, catchy and attention grabbing. Both instrumentals and songs with vocals are accepted. Below are three perfect examples of the musical direction we have in mind: 

Kanye West - BLKKK SKKKN HEAD
The Black Keys - Lonely Boy
Jet - Are You Gonna Be My Girl
We accept ONE-STOP submissions only, ie songs that you own or control 100% (writer, master and publisher). Please submit only professionally recorded and fully mastered songs. NO DEMOS, NO COVERS.
As an added bonus, if your song is Selected, we will offer to release your music on Filter Label. The songs by our talented artists can be heard in ad campaigns (McDonald's, Nike, Bank Millennium, Nestle, Philip Morris), TV series (The OA, Exatlon, CSI: Las Vegas, Nikita, Top Boy), films (Loneliness, Sex and Compassion, The Matrix Revisited, Cherie, Mission: Wolf), and on network television (CNN, MTV, Channel 5, National Geographic, NBA, UFC etc).- Emil Hadji Panzov / Filter Label

opportunities.name: Industry critiques for synch potential
opportunities.request_description:
Industry critiques for synch potentialSubmit to Pop-Up Music! Have your track critiqued and prepped for synch by Co-Director of Pop-up Music Mark Garfield. Key song writing elements will be covered, arrangement, composition, lyrics, musicality, as well as production values such as the mix/mastering, frequencies and stylistic awareness. Constructive criticism will be aimed at the songs synch potential for Film, TV, Advertising and Gaming. 

Mark Garfield has co-written songs with Cream's lyricist Pete Brown and Co-produced records with legendary producer Eddie Kramer (Jimi Hendrix, Led Zeppelin…) As a drummer toured the world and played major festivals such as Glastonbury not once but twice! Mark has a degree in Music Performance and teacher training. 

All feedback will have comprehensive detail which comes with an honest and professional insight to your song - WARNING which at times might be brutal! I look forward to hearing your song!

opportunities.request_description:
website: www.tama-industries.com


NEEDS:

Thank you for contacting Tama Industries Record Label. We send offers within 24-72 hours to ensure fast movement please include, up to 1-3 songs, your stage name, valid Contact information (e-mail, phone number), Biography & Social Media links, and EPK (if you have one).

EXTRA:

 Please also look for emails from our company and complete any needs necessary.  


OUR FOCUS:

To be clear we focus on building and branding Artists or Group Members to ultimately get you signed by a major label. We are not focused on making you rich but on creating a stable income. We are focused on stats, marketability, reach, sound, your look, and providing you with an Artist's net worth so that we can ultimately get you a deal. 


SHOWS: 

Thomas Jackson Booking Agency© will focus on booking local, regional, and national Tama Industries entertainers for a variety of venues. Working with The Company will provide over 150-400 show offers with 90% paid shows and 10% promotional. Thomas Jackson Booking Agency© handles all platforms of the booking process such as contracts, payments, booking page, Artist Itinerary, branding, and reputation for all booking legal and non-legal matters. As well as creating and designing riders and EPK’s. We also ensure each Artist or Group Member has a PRO account (BMI/ASCAP), radio play, and other marketing needs to ensure booking placement.


ARTIST HOUSING:

Upon signing, Artist or Group members understand you have the ability to secure housing with Tama Industries if and when needed. All rooms are fully furnished. We are currently ONLY housing our Artist or Group members in Killeen, TX. Artist or Group members must make The Company aware if housing is needed. 

All housing options include; all bills paid, 3 meals a day provided, transportation to and from jobs, and studio sessions. Currently, we only have housing for Signed Artist or Group members. We do NOT have housing for Artist or Group members AND their family members.

opportunities.name: Offering song critiques for J-pop and K-pop markets
opportunities.request_description:
Offering song critiques for J-pop and K-pop marketsIn this dropbox, Audity Music is offering the opportunity for expert critique of your song with an eye towards helping you understand what is required to make records that work in the Japan and Korea markets. 

Audity has an especially strong niche in Asia, having relationships with top songwriters, producers, record labels, publishers and other key players that are difficult to rival. Our on-the-ground experience in Japan and Korea has given us the opportunity to develop a unique expertise in both markets. Now, we are offering to share our knowledge with you in order to boost your chances of successful pitching and placement in Asia. A lot of writers come to us seeking information about and access to the Asia markets. Here's your chance.

Why YOU should consider Asia?

Japan is the second largest music market in the world, not very far behind the U.S. in terms of annual music revenues. If you ignore Japan, you could be giving up substantial income as a songwriter; indeed you may find that income in Japan exceeds income in your home market if you can create the music sought in the Japanese market and have the right avenues in which to pitch it. Additionally, Korea is a very strong market in Asia that tends to lean a bit more Western in its music soundscape. the K-pop market has been growing increasingly strong in recent years, especially on the international scene as Korean record labels have been excellent as pushing K-Pop outside of Korea and even outside of Asia to Europe, America, South America, etc.

China/Taiwan is another growing force to be reckoned with and strongly considered by songwriters as China's intellectual property protection and licensing regime comes into form. You will find that all the major U.S. labels, Korean labels, Japanese labels, etc are now partnering with Chinese companies to be prepared for when China's regime truly comes online. And, Mandopop is a strong force in China, largely emanating from Taiwan.

If you want Audity Music's expertise on Asia markets for your benefit, submit here! We encourage writers to pursue the diversification of markets for their music and always have an international mindset. Music is the universal language after all!

If we REALLY like your song(s) and think has placement potential with some additional production/editing/co-writing, we may be in touch via direct message to work further with you and offer such services. And, if we think your song(s) is already a good fit for the markets, we may reach out to discuss representation of your music in Asia and beyond. Again, Asia is our particularly unique niche. However, we pitch music around the world. We're not here to just take fees. We want to find great writers and work with them! Our expert critiques will take time significantly more time than simply voting "Selected" or "Not Selected", thus the higher submission fee. 

Looking forward to hearing your songs!
- Audity Music, LLC

opportunities.name: Revolt Artist Management
opportunities.request_description:
Revolt Artist ManagementSubmit to Revolt Artist Management for feedback on your tracks.Revolt is an Artist Management company based in the UK, providing representation to artists across the globe. We’ve worked with 80’s legend 'Tiffany’, known for the 1987 Billboard #1 ‘I Think We’re Alone Now’, as well as 'Cellar Door Moon Crow', 'The Last Internationale', 'GUN’, 'The Graveltones', 'Dead Romantic' and ’Silverkord’ (just to name a few!)

Our artists have played Download Festival, Lollapalooza, Hellfest, Nova Rock, BST Hyde Park, Venoge Festival, Rock Werchter, Pinkpop Festival, Let’s Rock 80’s Festival, Forever Young Festival, Impact Festival. As well as their own headline tours, our artists have supported KISS, Rage Against The Machine, Deep Purple, Rival Sons, The Cult, The Picturebooks, Skindred.- Ciaran Ballard -
Manager - Revolt Artist Management

opportunities.name: Submit your song for honest critiques & Advices
opportunities.request_description:
Submit your song for honest critiques & AdvicesCritiques & Advices from Producer/Engineer/Manager 
Please submit your best to Sheysman "Sound Lord" for sharp, honest feedback.
Emmy Sound I believe in developing relationships and making connections. When I work with you I begin by finding out about you, what you like, and where you've been. I learn who your favorite artists are, who inspires you, what entertains you or brings you joy. Always authentic I speak to you on a human level and share freely about lessons and tips I've learned along the way. I've been at The SoundBeat corp for the past 8 years. Before that I worked at Polygram Classics & Jazz, as well as Rolling Stone Magazine. I feel lucky every day that I can work with what I love - music & people - and I don't have to wear a suit!- Emmy Sound -
Director - Sound Beat

opportunities.name: Professional song critique
opportunities.request_description:
Professional song critique Since I am a producer, I know how easy it is to lose perspective when you’re working on a project. With this service I can help you get back on track by telling you how your track is perceived by a seasoned outsider. I will comment on the lyrics, melodies, arrangement, production, mix, mastering, and anything else you would like. Just leave any questions with the submission and I'll give you a detailed response.Emmy Sound I believe in developing relationships and making connections. When I work with you I begin by finding out about you, what you like, and where you've been. I learn who your favorite artists are, who inspires you, what entertains you or brings you joy. Always authentic I speak to you on a human level and share freely about lessons and tips I've learned along the way. I've been at The SoundBeat corp for the past 8 years. I feel lucky every day that I can work with what I love - music & people - and I don't have to wear a suit!- Emmy Sound -

opportunities.name: Emmy Sound Brief Comments Critique
opportunities.request_description:
Emmy Sound Brief Comments CritiqueEmmy Sound Brief Comments Critique
Think of this listing as a light critique as opposed to my full critique you can find listed on my Music Xray profile page. I love hearing true talent and extraordinary songwriting. I listen to everything I receive and offer brief comments as per my professional opinion. Should I hear something for which I know of an opportunity, you will hear from me immediately although this is not the primary focus on this listing.

Jeffrey Weber has been a widely recognized music industry professional for over thirty years. He has produced over 175 CDs with releases on just about every major label as well as a host of independent labels. Along the way, his projects have yielded two Grammys, seven Grammy nominations, at least seventeen top ten albums, two number one albums and an assortment of other honors.

During his thirty plus year career his productions have also appeared on every major label including MCA, Warner Bros., Atlantic, BMG, Columbia, A&M, Elektra as well as such labels as GRP, Hip-O, Sheffield, Concord, Bainbridge, Silver Eagle, Zebra, among countless others.

- Emmy Sound -
Producing Director - Sound Beat

opportunities.name: Song Critique by a Pro Sound Producer, Have You Got A Hit Or Not?
opportunities.request_description:
Song Critique by a Pro Sound Producer, Have You Got A Hit Or Not?I can help you understand the essential elements required for a" Hit Song". I will bring my considerable experience to bear on assessing the strengths and weaknesses in your music submissions and guide you towards that elusive Hit. I can help you become a better song writer as I enhance and redefine your creative song writing abilities.

Successful / "Hit" songwriting... is the very foundation of the music industry. It is all about "The Song...You Cannot Polish A Turd'. The difference between a great song ...and "a hit song" can be in fact be tiny. The trick is knowing how to build on the core idea...and find true clarity in its content.

Discover the perfect balance between the key elements needed for success which is a top quality melody and lyric combined with solid structure and arrangement.- Emmy Sound -
Producing Director - Sound Beat

opportunities.name: Professional Song Critique
opportunities.request_description:
Professional Song Critique ubmit your song to Eliot he will provide you with a professional critique to help take it to the next level. Whether it is tips on lyrics, arrangement or melody, he will give it several listens and offer constructive criticism on what can be done to make the best song possible. As lead vocalist and song writer for international pop group, Blessid Union of Souls, Eliot has an impressive track record of hit songs and a knack for hearing memorable melodies to catch the ear of music executives and fans alike. He has worked with artists of several genres including pop/rock, AC, country and R&B so submit your MP3 and let him help steer you in the right direction for your song.- Emmy Sound -
Producing Director - Sound Beat

opportunities.name: Professional Song Critique from Pro Sound Lord Engineer
opportunities.request_description:
Professional Song Critique from Pro Sound Lord EngineerSong Submission Critique - Songwriters/Producers/Artist
We received several thousands of submissions per year and it takes an extreme effort to manage that process and respond to each and every submission but we are committed to listening to your new music.

As of June 2016, we now offer a BRAND NEW service, exclusively through Music Xray, to have your music heard by our A&R department. This is an extremely rare opportunity to have a guarantee that your music will be heard promptly.

The feedback you will receive will be for the song that you submit to our team. Once we receive your submission, your music will be critiqued by the A&R department.

We also have VIP options for a 1on1 with the company President himself via Skype as an additional service.- Emmy Sound -
Producing Director - Sound Beat

We have lots of happy testimonials from previous clients, check them out on www.glassefactorymedia.comGlasse Factory is a music and arts media platform dedicated to offering innovative original content that advances the modern cultural conversation while promoting an eclectic, exciting collection of up-and-coming talent. Launched by creatives, for creatives, what began as a photojournal in 2019 has developed into a multifaceted organization that features a seasonal magazine, an actively-updated website, radio stations, expansive artist services, and a steadily-growing presence on social media — including Twitch, Instagram, Tiktok, Discord, and Patreon.- Glasse Factory

opportunities.name: No Submission Fee Song Critique and Career Coaching to Lead to Possible Production Deal
opportunities.request_description:
Stuart and EPPS RECORDS 
is offering a song critique/career coaching for no submission fee! Take advantage of this opportunity to get your music in front of a seasoned professional who can help. Stuart Epps is happy to receive your submissions and provide you with a thoughtful song critique. He will provide his opinion on the song, the production or any other aspect that is of particular interest to you as well as Stuart's opinion regarding the commercial viability of the track. Stuart will also consider songs submitted to this drop box for potential production / development deals and will contact you about this to gauge your interest if he is blown away by what he hears. If you would simply like to be considered for a production / development deal and do not want a critique please submit to Stuart's other drop box under this profile. For most production deals there will be a fee involved which will be discussed. Some of Epps' most noteworthy clients have included Led Zeppelin, Eric Clapton, Chris Rea, George Harrison, Mick Fleetwood, Barry White, George Michael, Mark Owen, Cliff Richard, Twisted Sister, Brian Adams, Oasis, Kiki Dee, Robbie Williams, Bill Wyman and of course Elton John. In recent years he has continued to work with big name artists to great acclaim, as well as helping a host of promising new and up-and-coming artists to sound their best, both on demo recordings and in full studio productions.

opportunities.name: Hi there great music X-ray artists and songwriters .

We have music in "King Of Staten Island", "Once Upon In Hollywood",  "Shape Of Water" and 1000's of more Major Films and TV Shows!!  Join the Music Of The Sea Revolution!

If you sign with Music Of The Sea your music will be part of NBC/UNI, CBS Television, Vice, Omnicom system networks upon signing with us. We have deals with these Major Networks.

Because of the "High Profile Major Artists" in our catalog such as Beyonce, Janet Jackson, Chaka Khan, Bill Withers, Chic, Ojays, Sunshine Anderson, Dionne Farris, Kool and The Gang, etc, they are looking to use the "Music Of The Sea" brand and artist!

Have your song/tracks along ride along side the major artist in our catalog and grow your brand!!! "High Quality" tracks only, no exceptions! No Demos and unmastered tracks, no uncleared samples. You must have clean versions available, and you must own master and publishing rights! Huge opportunity!

If you have music in our catalog, your music is automatically being considered.

- Eddie Sea / Music Of The Sea

Why the higher than average submission fee?

Often we hear music that doesn’t make the final cut for a particular opportunity but we go ahead and select the song anyway because we believe the song is appropriate for other opportunities we’re working on. Here at Music of The Sea, we fill dozens of sync requests every week. We don’t have time to listen to everything so the higher submission fee tends to discourage all but the best - and we sign a lot of music and we place almost all of it.

We only offer one deal and the terms are the same for everyone, so don’t submit if you’re seeking another type of deal. If we select your song, you give us exclusive rights to the song for 3 years. If after three years we haven’t licensed your song, the rights revert back to you. If we do license your song, we share in the revenue. Often, if we love the song we hear and want to work with you we will also have interest in hearing other songs in your catalog and possibly doing a broader deal.

Often, if we love the song we hear and want to work with you we will also have interest in hearing other songs in your catalog and possibly doing a broader deal.

opportunities.name: Hip Hop Tracks Needed (up to £1000+ per use)
opportunities.request_description:
"Family friendly" Hip Hop Tracks Needed (£50-£1000+ per use) 
Seeking new "Family Friendly" Hip Hop tracks suitable for use in TV/Streaming, advertising, online videos, documentaries and films. 

“Family friendly” means tracks that lyrics are "appropriate" for all the family, from your grandmother to your kids, with universal themes and no swearing, talking about drugs or graphic sexualised content etc. (Boring I know, but there is a massive gap in the market for family friendly hip hop that can be used on Netflix, HBO, Hulu shows etc!). 

Music must be original, well produced, mixed and mastered. "Family friendly" lyrics needed, but great instrumentals tracks always welcome (and please make sure you can supply instrumental versions of vocal tracks), and all emotions/styles required from experimental beats to party bangers. 

Artists must own/control all rights to their music 100% on both sides (master & publishing) and there must be no copyright infringement.  

Selected tracks will be cleared into our catalogue and made available for existing clients to use in their projects, and pro-actively pitched to sync opportunities. Clients are professional film makers, TV/video production companies, games developers, advertising agencies etc, that produce high-end content. 

Music used by clients will be licensed on a non-exclusive basis (so you maintain all rights to your music), we simply go 50-50 on deals we get for you, you’re paid quarterly and keep 100% of all royalties generated from placements. 
 
Artist's will receive between £50-£1,000+ per track depending on use, type of project etc, and music will be available for all licensing opportunities. So, if you have any amazing Hip Hop tracks, I’d really love to hear from you! 

NB; If you have already had music accepted into our catalogue that is suitable for this brief, you don’t need to re-submit as your music will automatically be pitched to our clients.

Looking forward to hearing your music and working with you!
 
All the best, 
Giles Gale 

Music Supervisor

opportunities.name: Music Needed for YouTube Content Creators
opportunities.request_description:
Music Needed for YouTube Content CreatorsSeeking music for YouTube content creators!

I have started a new subscription service for YouTube content creators and seeking suitable music.

Music must be good vibes, positive and upbeat. All genres considered ie, Dance, Rock, Jazz, Electronica, Pop, R&B, Hip Hop, Classical, Orchestral, Ambient... etc. 

Music must be high-quality, mixed and mastered. Instrumental tracks preferred, but great vocal tracks accepted and please make sure you supply instrumental mix as well! 

All music will be listened to, reviewed and feedback given. Artists/rights holders must own all rights to their music (on both sides) and there must be no copyright infringement.

Selected tracks will be licensed on a non-exclusive basis (so you maintain all rights to your music), we simply go 50-50 split on income we generate for you, you'll be paid quarterly and you keep 100% of all backend royalties.

As well as YouTube videos, your music will also be made available to our B2B clients for traditional sync licensing deals. Clients are professional video/film production companies & advertising agencies that make high-quality content. Including brands; Oracle, Microsoft, JD Sports, The North Face, Asics, Addidas, Pringles, to name a few! 

For traditional sync deals artists will receive anywhere between £50-£10,000 per track depending on use, and there’s no limit the number of times a track can be licensed. So, if you have any great music we’d really love to hear from you! 

Any questions please feel free to ask and look forward to working with you :)

All the best, 
Giles

opportunities.name: Music Supervisor Pitching songs for 2024 film & TV cues $1k - $5k
opportunities.request_description:
Music Supervisor Pitching songs for 2024 film & TV cues $1k - $5k

We have a list of some huge films and some small Indies too. We have cues for action, romance, loss, Finding love, thrillers, killers, spillers, but not Ben Stillers.

In today's music business there are a lot of bands and artists who deserve deals, but with the industry in the state it is and the uncertainty of labels giving new bands money, they now want to see some kind of exposure first and getting a song in a film or TV show is a massive step and one of the best chances of nailing the record deal, so with that in mind...

Alexander Johnston, head of the Grand Northern Group / Grand Northern Sync is an industry composer/producer and music supervisor for various Hollywood and Global Film Production companies, film producers and writers and he is regularly sought out by various companies to either compose or over see the music for the various projects.

He is looking for songs of all genres and styles for placement in film and TV, it really can be anything, he wants to hear it all, as he is a great believer in everything should have a chance and he is convinced there are real quality people out there not getting the shots they deserve

Quality of recording is not essential as we may re-record certain songs if needed but quality of writing and lyrics must be top notch.

Deal Type: Sync Placement
Decision Maker: Selected tracks will be pitched for final decision
Deal Structure: Negotiable
Compensation: TBD based on placement from $1000-$25,000

- Alexander Johnston - CEO, Producer, Composer, Mixer, Musician - Grand Northern Sync

If chosen and hired, your voice will be recorded and then heard by top MIPs specifically in Nashville and Los Angeles. Full credit is given to chosen artists/vocalists on these recordings and you will be paid $100-$300. Please submit a solid example of your voice on a recording that has NOT BEEN AUTO TUNED.  A rough work tape, acoustic guitar/vocal, piano/vocal, a cappella or live performance is preferred.  All genres, all tempos are acceptable, as Betsy Walter is a multi-genre award-winning producer/songwriter with songs in pop, jazz, R&B, country, soul, adult contemporary, gospel, bluegrass, rock and Americana.  

When you submit, please indicate in your message if you have access to home studio or would need to go to a studio to record.  You may also include links to recordings on your website, YouTube, etc. for further examples of your voice for consideration. - Betsy Walter

Tim's signature sound is what has made him a legend, and we're looking for songs that stay true to that sound while also bringing a fresh and modern edge to them musically and melodically. opportunities.name: REMOTE: Celtic Roots Radio
opportunities.request_comments: As funding and support for Celtic Roots Radio increases we plan in the near future to also add a Celtic Roots TV show, so if you have a high quality video of your song/tune please let us know.
opportunities.request_description: Regular podcast show and 24/7 Shoutcast web station
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Celtic Roots Radio is a podcast dedicated to promoting traditional and contemporary Celtic music from around the world. Hosted by Raymond McCullough and Gerry McCullough, the podcast features interviews from a variety of guests including musicians, poets, writers, and historians to explore the rich cultural heritage of Celtic music.Since its launch in 2007, Celtic Roots Radio has developed a loyal following among music lovers and cultural enthusiasts. The show is available to stream or download on various platforms including iTunes, Spotify, and Soundcloud.Through its engaging interviews, informative segments, and captivating music, Celtic Roots Radio continues to inspire and educate audiences around the world about the timeless beauty and power of Celtic music.
opportunities.request_band_description: We are looking for artists and bands in the following categories:Celtic, folk, folk/rock, Irish, Scottish, Cajun, Breton/Breizh, Galician, Cape Breton, Appalachian, Mountain, acoustic, singer/songwriter and (sometimes) blues.We do NOT play any Country, heavy rock/metal or Reggae music!
opportunities.request_selection_description: This is an unpaid gig.
opportunities.description: Celtic Roots Radio is more than just a podcast â€“ it's a community of like-minded individuals who share a passion for preserving and promoting the rich cultural heritage of Celtic music. The podcast serves as a platform for musicians and artists to showcase their work and connect with a global audience.Celtic Roots Radio is looking for Sonicbids artists to be featured on their show! Apply today!
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_description: Celtic Roots Radio means Celtic, Irish, Scottish, Breton/Breizh, Galician, Appalachian, Mountain, Bluegrass, Cape Breton, some blues, some singer/songwriter (– NO pop, rap, reggae, country, metal,  heavy rock, etc.
opportunities.promoter_group_short_description: We have a very popular station and podcast show and have given exposure to 279 bands and artists to date. We have not used SonicBids for a while, but are now looking for new talent to add to our shows.

opportunities.name: REMOTE: Santa Rosa Records (Blog)
opportunities.request_description: aaj
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Santa Rosa Records is an independent record label based in Santa Rosa, California. Founded in 2015, the label's mission is to provide a platform for independent artists and to promote a diverse range of musical styles. With a focus on supporting emerging artists, Santa Rosa Records aims to help musicians take their careers to the next level by providing resources and support that are often difficult to come by in the music industry.Santa Rosa Records is a beacon of hope for independent artists looking to break into the music industry. With a strong commitment to quality and an unwavering dedication to supporting emerging talent, the label is poised to continue making a significant impact on the world of music.
opportunities.request_band_description: Indie, folk, and alternative acts are welcome to applyActs must have upcoming music and/or recent releasesOriginal music only!
opportunities.request_selection_description: Selected acts will be reviewed and featured on the blog, and even have the opportunity to be interviewed!
opportunities.description: Santa Rosa Records is an independent label, recording studio, and curator of alternative roots music from around the globe and across all genres. They present readers with upcoming indie acts that have new releases. Santa Rosa Records is looking for Sonicbids artists to be featured or interviewed on its blog.

opportunities.name: REMOTE: 360 Magazine
opportunities.request_description: aaj
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: 360 Magazine is an edgy fashion, lifestyle and culture magazine. We will introduce cutting-edge brands, entities and trends to tastemakers within their respective communities. Our founding members have over 30 years of collective experience both as notable talent and uber professionals within the realm of fashion, music, art, design and entertainment. We are more than just a magazine comprised of journalists, representing a movement of social awareness and change.The magazine is contemporary in look and appeal. Quality art content is the constant goal. The magazine will be entertaining, newsworthy and thought-provoking. It will appeal to a broad entertainment readership. No magazine like it is available today, constantly celebrating racial and sexual ambiguous talent and artists.
opportunities.request_band_description: We're looking for ALL GENRESWe're looking for forward-thinking, unique, and industry-savvy artists to be featured in our magazine.
opportunities.request_selection_description: Core Demographic: 19-39 year-old college-educated people
opportunities.description: 360 Magazine is an introspective digital/print/tablet portrait series, which encapsulates artists/brands/entities who embody the true essence of our publication- empowerment, equality, sensuality and most important of all, humanity within a global society.We're looking for Sonicbids artists to be featured in our magazine!

opportunities.name: REMOTE: For The Wild Podcast
opportunities.request_description: vkhg
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: For the Wild is an environmental nonprofit & weekly podcast. We discuss the critical ideas of our time and parlay them into action for the defense and regeneration of natural communities. Key topics include the rediscovery of wild nature, ecological renewal and resistance, and healing from the trauma of individualistic society. The podcast takes a holistic approach to environmentalism, recognizing that the issues we face are not just scientific or technical, but deeply rooted in culture, history, and politics. By centering the experiences and perspectives of Indigenous peoples, people of color, and other marginalized communities, For The Wild seeks to challenge dominant narratives and offer a more inclusive vision of environmentalism.
opportunities.request_band_description: All genres are welcome! We highlight artists whose work is in alignment with our vision.We are looking to uplift the voices of the POC and LGBTQIA community.
opportunities.request_selection_description: For The Wild Podcast: featured on all streaming platforms + national, international & local radio playFor The Wild Podcast Social Media Promo ClipsGratis Licensing in exchange for our Promotional Package
opportunities.description: For The Wild is a podcast dedicated to exploring the intersection of ecology and culture. Hosted by Ayana Young, each episode features conversations with scientists, activists, and artists who are working to create a more just and sustainable world.For The Wild has gained a following for its thought-provoking conversations and commitment to amplifying diverse voices in the environmental movement. With new episodes released every week, it is a must-listen for anyone interested in the intersection of ecology and culture, and the future of our planet. We are looking for Sonicbids artists to submit their music for our podcasts! Availability is always changing, so apply today!

opportunities.name: REMOTE: Holdupbaby Radio
opportunities.request_description:
Submit to have your music played on our Oklahoma Online Independent Music Radio Station. 
   The featured Show is National Independent Music Mondays, where we play the hottest Oklahoma music with the other 49 states in America. 
   The show is hosted live and gets real, networking is insane, and a good place to gain exposure. 
   Hosted live on www.holdupbabyradio.com by Y2DA_P every Monday at 6pm central time.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Holdupbaby Radio is a dynamic and innovative online radio station that is dedicated to supporting independent artists and providing listeners with a diverse range of music and programming. With its engaged community of listeners and passionate team of volunteers, the station has become a vital part of the independent music scene and a destination for music lovers worldwide.Holdupbaby Radio also features regular programming on a variety of topics, including entertainment news, pop culture, and social issues. The station hosts a range of shows and podcasts, each with its unique perspective and style.
opportunities.request_band_description: Looking for artists with professionally recorded (or self recorded with professional sound) tracks Open to all genres include Hip Hop, Rock, Pop, etc.
opportunities.request_selection_description: Shows are normally Mondays at 6pm CTThis is an ongoing opportunity, please apply and we'll consider your band for various dates throughout the coming weeks/months
opportunities.description: Holdupbaby Radio is committed to promoting independent and emerging artists. The station features a curated playlist of music from unsigned artists, providing them with an opportunity to gain exposure and reach new listeners. The station also hosts regular live sessions and interviews with up-and-coming musicians.The featured show is National Independent Music Mondays, where we play the hottest Oklahoma music with the other 49 states in America. We are looking for Sonicbids artists to apply to our station for the opportunity to get air time!
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_description: Radio, club, Interviews, Showcases, ect
opportunities.promoter_group_short_description: Oklahoma's Independent Artist Platform and now bringing to the table National Independent Music.. Live at 6pm on Holdupbabyradio.com

opportunities.name: REMOTE: Radio Crystal Blue
opportunities.request_comments:
*Note:
Artists with very little, to no bio, may not be considered, for airplay, as we need information about you, and your music, to share with listeners.

Tips:
1) Please provide a minimum of three tracks, in your EPK, so as to have a variety of songs, for us to hear. 

2) EPKs that have links to video, as well as photos, if available, help us get to know you, as an artist.

3) We can help listeners find you better, if links to your artist/band's website, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Soundcloud, etc., are posted.

4) Keeping tracks FCC clean is our goal. Any profanity will be omitted, in the final edits, of the show.
opportunities.request_description:
Radio Crystal Blue is a long-running, freeform radio program, that you can download, share, and listen to, in accordance with Creative Commons licensing, 4.0 - (under the terms: non-derivative, non-commercial, and with full attribution). This program is brought to you, as a public service, by your host, Dan Herman.

(Co-Producer: DJ Flowerdove)

  Radio Crystal Blue.show, Radio Crystal Blue.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Radio Crystal Blue Novus Ordo, a 3x monthly program, is a sister program to host Dan Herman's 18-year-old online program Radio Crystal Blue. Dan Herman and Radio Crystal Blue have been connecting music makers and music lovers all over the globe with an eclectic and exciting range of music which you’d never hear anywhere else. Crystal Blue's free-form style is an invitation to explore the artist's music. As music lovers, we don’t like to put walls around “genres” – not that the term really applies – we construct extended sets of the kind you rarely ever hear any more on over-the-air radio.

Tracks that are approved will be heard on RCB's Novus Ordo podcast, with later airplay, on the main show.For a proper submission, artists must be active, and releases must be within the past year. Downloads will be considered for RCB itself.Original music onlyAll GENRES are welcome except No hip-hop or metalTo be considered for submissions, artists must be actively performing/touringArtists must have released an album within the last 6 monthsArtists applying must have mixed and mastered songs

opportunities.name: REMOTE: The Alternative Mixtapes
opportunities.request_description: dhsf
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Other blogs and playlists are full of uninspiring, tolerable songs. You have to listen to 40 tracks to find one you like, let alone love. The people creating those lists only care about finding songs that match a certain criteria: being a certain genre (which are broad in themselves), recently released, and/or from certain artists. Since they try to please as many people as possible with their playlists, they end up being inconsistent.The Alternative Mixtapes looks to be different. We stand out from the rest. If you are an artist and would like to be featured here, we are happy to listen to your songs, but to be featured we have to genuinely love your songs. We are a mile above the rest. We are The Alternative Mixtapes.
opportunities.request_band_description: Open to Alternative Rock, Indie, Pop-Punk, Ambient/Chill Out, Pop or trance genres
opportunities.request_selection_description: Selected acts will have a single/album reviewed and will be featured on the Alternative music tracks blog.
opportunities.description: The Alternative Mixtapes purpose is to share great songs with listeners. A great song can transport you back to the first time you heard it, or to a period of your life when you were often listening to it. Few things in life beat that feeling you get when you hear a great song for the first time. The Alternative Mixtapes seeks to give you that feeling. We are looking for Sonicbids artists to be featured on our playlists and blogs. Apply today!

opportunities.name: REMOTE: Erzetich - Compilation CD
opportunities.request_comments:
The selection process:
1. we listen to your music – we prefer original genres that aren't easy to categorize,
2. if we like what we hear, we will ask you for a lossless audio file to check the quality of the recording,
3. if everything's fine, you're in.

Before you submit, be sure that:
1. you have an excellent recording in lossless format (FLAC or WAV),
2. you have a professionally taken photo in high resolution,
3. you have a professionally written bio.

What you get:
- 5 copies of the CD,
- distribution of the CD to the audiophile community (our partners, our customers, Hi-Fi show visitors, journalists, and established musicians/managers/producers that we're already working with),
- 50 % discount on any of our equipment.
opportunities.request_description:
We are accepting submissions for our 2nd compilation that will be printed onto an audiophile-grade gold-plated CD.

We are looking for music that is suitable for demonstrating high-end equipment, therefore music that is not only original and well-executed but the one that is also recorded and produced with above-average quality. Although we like energetic rock and metal, these and similar genres are the ones that we will have to skip for this project. All the rest is more than welcome.

As it was for our first compilation, this one will be either a giveaway to our partners and customers, as well as sold on our website for NO-PROFIT (only the cost of a physical CD, packaging, and shipping will be charged).

With this compilation, we aim to promote quality artists (including their producers and audio engineers) along with our brand.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: We put the music first by creating products for people, not for measuring instruments. It is important that our products sound right, pleasant, and musical. Technology is just a means to achieve that. Erzetich makes products that notable artists such as Imogen Heap, David Bottrill, Bill Gould, and many more love and rely on when producing. Our workshop is located in the Slovenian woods and thatâ€™s why we use a lot of (tilia) wood in our products. Despite our industrial/brutalist design approach, the (artificially aged) wood makes our products more organic and personal. By using sturdy materials we make our products long-lived and easily repairable, therefore sustainable. Being ourselves with the music background, we constantly work with established as well as independent musicians to promote their work and good sound.
opportunities.request_band_description: Open to all genres besides rock, metal, and similar genresMust have original music recorded and produced with above-average quality.
opportunities.request_selection_description: Unpaid- This compilation is meant to demonstrate Erzetich's equipment and will be a giveaway to partners and customers, in addition to being sold on their website for non-profitWe will promote artists along with our brand for the CD release
opportunities.description: The high-end music gear brand, Erzetich Audio, aims at enhancing personal music enjoyment by producing high-quality headphones and headphone amplifiers with specific rustic/industrial design. All units are carefully handmade and tested by ear and by measuring instruments.Erzetich is accepting submissions for their compilation album that will be printed onto an audiophile-grade gold-plated CD! Apply today!
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_description: Music that is suitable for getting the best out of the audiophile equipment - excellent performance along with an excellent production/recording.
opportunities.promoter_group_short_description:
We have access to the audiophile community that includes our customers, our partners (resellers, established musicians/managers/producers, journalists), trade show visitors, etc.

Should bands be interested in our equipment we are giving them a significant discount.

opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Omari Music Promotions has garnered millions of website visits to our popular articles & services, helped over 15,000 artists promote their music through custom advertising campaigns, hired a dozen team members, and generated millions in sales. The company has solidified itself as one of the top independent music marketing agencies online. opportunities.name: REMOTE: The Music Network
opportunities.request_description: The Music Network TV (TMN) is a cutting-edge TV music channel, hosting daily music videos, interviews, live performances, documentaries, and more. TMN is proud to be non-corporate and supportive of indie artists (as well as the big dogs) because this channel was created for the music, by musicians, for everyone to enjoy with over 28 Million potential viewers! Soon to be available on Fire TV Stick programming, TMN can be accessed globally via Roku’s Channel Store. For more info: www.themusicnetwork.tv or www.facebook.com/themusicnetworktv
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: The Music Network is one of the world's most influential 24/7 music TV stations featured on Roku & Apple TVs' prime install lineup. The Music Network broadcasts to 17 countries to a massive, passionate viewership. The TV station is an industry collaboration between some of the world's most significant record labels, artists, producers, promotional companies, and broadcast outlets.The Music Network TV hosts daily music videos, interviews, live performances, documentaries, and more. opportunities.request_description:
One of the hottest top-of-the-charts stations, RockLan One Radio airs the biggest, most current song releases without excluding top hits from  recent times. All urban genres such as Hip-Hop, R&B, Dance but also including BillBoard Hits are all part of the mix. A solid, all-hits playlist, bringing you the singles that topped the charts all over the world. Let the name speak out for itself.

RockLan One Radio is available on all media platforms… All mobile devices (Apple and Android), iPads, Tablets, and web-based applications. Go to any app store and download the RockLan One Radio’ App and you are now connected to the hottest radio station… RockLan One Radio.

RockLan One Radio plays the hottest artists as well as upcoming artists that you can find on BillBoard’s Emerging Artists Chart. The BillBoard’s Emerging Artists Chart is a weekly ranking of the most  shared songs on Twitter in the U.S. by up-and-coming artists, ranked by the number of shares over a seven-day period (Monday to Sunday). This chart is available online on billboard.com and billboard.biz, and in print in Billboard. The Emerging Artists Chart only includes songs by new and developing artists, who are defined as those who have fewer than 50,000 Twitter followers and have not appeared as a lead artist in the  top 50 songs on the Billboard Hot 100.

www.RL1Radio.com

opportunities.name: APPLY: Indie Promo Circuit
opportunities.request_description:
Our Indie Promo Circuit is a marketing & opportunity platform designed specifically for Indie Talent in mind. Allowing each individual participate to have their talents seen, heard & curated with the opportunity to perform Live via IPC-Cam Connect or Live on stage at various studio venues. Participants will be selected from their submissions & will have the chance to“GET EXPOSURE”-“GET BOOKED”- “GET PAID” from global industry opportunities. The IPC is brought to you by Indie Movement - Club 47 Recording / ASCAP Publishing, and is open to ALL GENRES OF MUSIC and ENTERTAINMENT TALENTS. 

All participates are allowed to submit two (2) audition tracks and or videos. The participates selected will either be booked for upcoming performance gigs with some gigs offering compensation ranging from $50 - $1,000 or Free Major Promotional Exposure. Other offers include; Record Deals, Distribution Deals, Magazine Article Write-Up, Radio/TV Airplay & or Studio/Rehearsal Time. As well as Audio/Video Placement, Licensing, Publishing & Compilation Album/DVD Deals. Information will be posted on our website, explaining the benefits offered for each opportunity. 

For the participates that were not selected; could be chosen by our Industry Rep & receive Talent Development. We assist the talent by providing development training, studio / rehearsal time & other valuable resources to help prepare the talent for upcoming opportunities.

Our events & auditions will be filmed & streamed to over 100K viewers, as well as in front of crowds up to 5,000+ in attendance. Selected participates will be featured on our Compilation Album & DVD series. This includes worldwide major distribution for the series to over 200+ digital retail providers through The Orchard and ASCAP Publishing through Indie Movement / Club 47 Recording, reaching an audience of over 100 Million+. 

We also assist the talent with a Bio (Digital EPK) and a Promotional “Talent” Website Landing Page (When Applicable). We/re offering an incredible opportunity for a variety of talented participates. From indie artist, musicians, bands, cover bands, comedians, magicians, dance groups, dj’s, improv comedy acts, solo artist, music producers & the like from ALL OVER THE WORLD. 

If your looking to make a name for yourself in the music & entertainment industry, the time is now. We’ve collaborated with major & independent music & entertainment industry professionals to offer valuable and extremely tangible assistance, advice, industry deals and solid performance opportunities. Your submission will be seen, heard, curated, as well as provided honest feedback & make adjustments to your submissions (When applicable).

Our Events will be filmed, streamed and submitted to Major Networks to be televised & for syndication possibilities. Our event will be Promoted Through Major Network Radio & TV Ads, Internet TV & Radio, Websites, Social Media, Magazine Exposure & more, totaling over 80 Million+. Reaching a combined total audience of over 180 Million+. 

We’re offering an incredible opportunity for;
-Indie artist
-Musicians
-Bands
-Cover bands
-Solo artist, 
-Groups
-Music producers
-Magicians
-Dance groups 
-DJ’s 
and more from ALL GENRES OF MUSIC & TALENT.

Information will be posted on our website, explaining the benefits offered for each opportunity. For the participates who were not selected for the gig/opportunity; it means we either have all slots filled and or your talents may need some development training. If so; you could be chosen by our Industry Rep & receive Talent Development Coaching. We assist the talent by providing development coaching, studio/rehearsal time & other valuable resources to help prepare the talent for upcoming opportunities.

opportunities.name: REMOTE: Playdate Media
opportunities.request_description:
In 2020, we had the idea to create PLAYDATE., a music discovery platform that aims to step out of the mainstream music sphere to highlight the thousands of talented underground artists who are on the verge of breaking through.

The PLAYDATE. team consists of six people, each of whom are music lovers, passionate people, and hard workers. Each individual brings a unique perspective to the table that has proven to be invaluable for PLAYDATE.

Furthermore, artist management is something we've been extremely passionate about since the inception of PLAYDATE. Through our teams past experience in management, the blog space, A&R work, and through the education we’ve received, we are well equipped in handling all sides of talent management.

Our journey to where we are today has been incredible. We are extremely grateful for the connections we've made with artists, producers, managers, curators, A&Rs, writers, videographers, photographers, graphic designers and music lovers. These relationships have allowed us to foster our own PLAYDATE. community, which has led us to where we are today.

opportunities.description: Send us your music and our team will give it a listen.If we like what we hear, we'l reach out to you for more info & to cover it.

opportunities.name: REMOTE: Uncharted Waters Show
opportunities.request_description: MVY Radio is looking for artists to be featured on Uncharted Waters, a new music show, featuring artists you know and love but also many that you've never heard.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Since 1983, WMVY has operated out of a little house, at the end of a dirt road, on a special little Island off the coast of Massachusetts. Independent and eclectic, not unlike the local populace, the station has always remained true to the vision of being a Voice For The Vineyard.WMVY's goal is to serve the communities of Martha's Vineyard and Cape Cod and to reflect the voice and spirit of those who live here, through the station's programming and personalities. The station provides local and national news and broadcasts Public Service announcements for local nonprofit organizations. Artists have the opportunity to be featured on a new radio show through MVY Radio.
opportunities.request_band_description: We want independent artists who are looking to get their name and music out to a new audience. Any and all genres are welcome to apply.
opportunities.request_selection_description: If selected, artists will:have their music featured on Uncharted Waters, which airs live every Friday at 9pm and is replayed every Sunday at 9pmhave their music added to the Uncharted Waters Spotify playlists, which are updated monthly
opportunities.description: MVY Radio aspires to reflect Martha's Vineyard and the region in music, news, culture and community. MVY Radio embraces its local, regional and worldwide roots through its independent format, and uses contemporary media and community engagement to enrich the lives of our audience.MVY Radio is looking for artists to be featured on Uncharted Waters, a new music show, featuring artists you know and love but also many that you've never heard.

opportunities.name: REMOTE: One on One Music
opportunities.request_description: We're One on One and we shout about the music we love because we think that you'll love it too.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: We’re a website, we’re based in the United Kingdom, and we really love music. We’ve got the passion. We really do believe that there are thousands of great bands and solo artists out there who deserve to be listened to. We believe that a few great songs can turn a good memory into a fantastic one. And, most of all, we still believe that people deserve to be told about the best stuff, and warned about the rest.
opportunities.request_band_description: Looking for bands from a wide variety of genres.
opportunities.request_selection_description: If selected artists can:be featured on the blogbe interviewed have their music reviewed have their music added to our Spotify Playlists
opportunities.description: One on One Music is looking for new artists to be featured on our blog. At the end of the day, the music is all we care for. We don’t feature a band/singer/etc. purely because they’re a ‘buzz band’, or because everyone’s billing them as the ‘SAVIOURS OF ROCK AND ROLL’ – we only write about the music we love. Basically, we want you to be sure that we’re only shouting about a band because we think that they’re absolutely fantastic and because we want you to love them too. Isn’t that the whole idea?

opportunities.name: PLAY: New York City w/ CEG
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: You've packed out the smaller bars and clubs-- so it's time to move on to bigger things. Literally. If you're ready to play bigger rooms, CEG wants to book you in New York's larger venues, including Gramercy Theatre, Hall of MP, Highline Ballroom, City Winery, and Irving Plaza. This is a great opportunity for emerging acts that are serious about their career and who are consistently playing, releasing material and growing their fan base.If you're interested in playing our venue, apply and we'll send you availabilities that we think fit your band!
opportunities.request_band_description: Open to all musical genresMust be able to draw crowds appropriate for larger venues (minimum 75 people)21+Bands must be actively playing shows Acts must have a solid online presence All acts applying must meet the criteria that we look for, lyrics, stage presence, style Bands must be willing to heavily promote the show if chosen to play
opportunities.request_selection_description: 30-40 minute setSound and lights providedFull backline providedOur venues range from 200-1000 CapacityCompensation: TBD at time of booking Artists must have a fanbaseBands are able to sell merch on-site
opportunities.description: CEG Entertainment group is an industry leader in club and concert promotion, artist management, venue management, private event booking and coordination and more. We're looking for bands who are ready to make the jump to larger venues in New York City and take their music career to the next level. It's that time of the year for local and touring bands to come and play at NYC's best music venues! CEG is looking for awesome bands to play throughout fall and winter.

opportunities.name: PLAY: Far-True (NYC)
opportunities.request_description: club shows
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Start local, go global and change the world by sharing your music. At Far True we work exclusively with music artists from concept to stage. Our team is devoted to kickstarting each artists career through live performances all around the world, bridging the gap between local artists and global expansion.Far True is a progressive music, art, skate multimedia company dedicated to consulting, booking, artist representation and promoting music artists countrywide. We're currently looking to book Sonicbids acts for the fall quarter.Availability and open slots change consistently, apply to play and we'll find out a day and time that works best for everyone!
opportunities.request_band_description: Welcome to a wide variety of genresOpen to acts from NYC and the surrounding Tri-state areaBands must promote showsBands must have a solid online presence
opportunities.request_selection_description: Looking to book original acts that can play 30-40 min slotsAll venues we book have full backline and PA'sSound engineers provided at all our showsArtists may sell merchandise and keep 100% of the revenue sold at showsArtists must draw 20+ Compensation is dependent on the draw on a show to show basis. Artists pay NOTHING to us. opportunities.name: REMOTE: Fox and the King Agency
opportunities.request_description: Fox
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Founded in 2012, The Fox And King (TFAK) began as a grassroots movement focused on bringing together local musicians and groups under one banner. With this coalition of local talent, it developed into a booking agency focused on expanding the platform for the artists who are often overlooked and underappreciated. In this mindset, we've grown immensely due to a team who themselves are just as passionate about music as the artists they work with. At TFAK, we believe in changing the way the music industry works for those artists looking to build a lasting career from an independent level and above. We believe in the concepts of DIY, highlighting undiscovered music, and building a lasting brand that works towards the independent music scene of today.
opportunities.request_band_description: We're looking for great bands of all genres with a professional mindset and sound. Looking for bands that want to be part of our movement of great music, great people, and push their career forward.
opportunities.request_selection_description: Pay for bands is based upon the level of partnership we agree on. We NEVER ask bands for upfront money. We like to partner and grow together!
opportunities.description: Accepting applications to be part of Fox & The King roster. We're a premier music entertainment agency specializing in producing live music events, marketing, brand promotion, video, and media production, and assist in artist development. There are many different opportunities for us to work together.
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_description: We're looking to work with acts of numerous genres across New York and further. We specialize in small-to-mid range events as well as music series' and artist tours.
opportunities.promoter_group_short_description: At TFAK, we believe in changing the way the music industry works for those artists looking to build a lasting career from an independent level and above. We believe in the concepts of DIY, highlighting undiscovered music, and building a lasting brand that works towards the independent music scene of today. We produce live music events, handle marketing and brand promotion on multiple levels, provide video and media production, and assist in artist development.

opportunities.name: PLAY: CEG Presents Concert Series (NY)
opportunities.request_description:
CEG Presents is an entertainment company that does club & concert promotion, private event booking and coordination, marketing, sponsorship and promotional services to venues and musical artists of all ranges and genres. We go into venues that range in capacity and scene such as Arlene's Grocery (120 cap), DROM (200 cap), The Cutting Room 350-500 based on seating vs standing), Knitting Factory (300 cap), Public Arts, Irving Plaza, Gramercy Theatre, Highline Ballroom, Le Poisson Rouge, Brooklyn Bowl, and Rocks Off concert cruises to name a few.

We are looking to work with musicians who are dedicated to building a relrelationship with CEG and the NYC market.

We are live music fans first and foremost and we look forward to working with new and exciting musicians!​
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: CEG Presents is an entertainment company that does club & concert promotion, private event booking and coordination, marketing, sponsorship and promotional services to venues and musical artists of all ranges and genres. We go into venues that range in capacity and scene such as Arlene's Grocery (120 cap), DROM (200 cap), The Cutting Room 350-500 based on seating vs standing), Knitting Factory (300 cap), Public Arts, Irving Plaza, Gramercy Theatre, Highline Ballroom, Le Poisson Rouge, Brooklyn Bowl, and Rocks Off concert cruises to name a few.We are live music fans first and foremost and we look forward to working with new and exciting musicians!
