opportunities.name: REMOTE: Featured Artist on DiscoverYouRadio
opportunities.request_comments:
WE DO NOT ACCEPT EXPLICIT MATERIAL!  
Please no political hate songs either. 
We are not interested in Likes or Views anyone has. We are not interested if you have a big social media presence. We are only interested in your music. 
We are also interested in finding an artist who is humble and hard working to give one of our authentic crystal awards to. 

We are here for true art.
opportunities.request_description: Discover YOU RADIO is looking for an artist for our featured artist section for the month of May 2020.  We would like to invite anyone who is thinking about applying to please take a look at our station at DiscvoverYouRadio.com and make sure that it is a true fit for you. We have 2 stations that broadcasts and we are syndicated with Midas Touch Radio in the UK.  One of our stations allows everyone to get their foot in the door (Explicit Material Not Accepted.) On our other station we are very picky. Songs have to be very well produced and written. We may let a few hopefuls through the door to see how well they sound along side others who top the billboard charts but it is all a matter of listener reception. In the meantime while we are in this process of looking for Our Next Featured Artist we can add your music to our station. We ask that you send 1 song in MP3 format (Preferrably Your Best) 1 Promo picture to submit@discoveryouradio.com. In the subject header please write "Sonic Bids Radio Submission"  and we will be glad to add your music to our "Foot in the Door" Station. Please note: We have the right to refuse submissions of an explicit nature. P.S. Every Month Discover YOU RADIO gives out a genuine crystal award. This award can not be applied for. Once you get to know us better, I'm sure you'll understand what we're talking about.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: We have two stations that broadcasts and we are syndicated with Midas Touch Radio in the UK. One of our stations allows everyone to get their foot in the door (Explicit Material Not Accepted.) On our other station we are very picky. Songs have to be very well produced and written. We may let a few hopefuls through the door to see how well they sound along side others who top the billboard charts but it is all a matter of listener reception.
opportunities.request_band_description: Open to a wide range of genresBands need to have a fully completed EPK Artists must be able to submit images and mp3 in order to apply Please note: We have the right to refuse submissions of an explicit nature.
opportunities.request_selection_description: While we are in this process of looking for our next featured artist we can add your music to our station. We ask that you submit one song in MP3 format (preferably your best track ) and one image file. P.S. Every Month Discover YOU RADIO gives out a genuine crystal award. This award can not be applied for. Once you get to know us better, I'm sure you'll understand what we're talking about.
opportunities.description: DiscoverYouRadio is looking for an artist for our featured artist section.  We would like to invite anyone who is thinking about applying to please take a look at our station at DiscvoverYouRadio.com and make sure that it is a true fit for you.
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_description: We are a radio type of PR firm. We are always looking for hard working discover-able artists and love to award those who are exceptional due to their hard work.
opportunities.promoter_group_short_description: We are a useful source for bands to reach fans and we really enjoy what we do. We are on the simple side of things and put a lot of time and effort into our radio station and podcasts. Bands and artists need PR and that's what we do. We reach out constantly. Success doesn't come from laziness and we are not lazy in this business.
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_roster: ALBA, Bob Malone, Marty Rifkin, Randy Crenshaw, Frankie M.,  Julian and Dominique, Andy Hill, Theresa James

opportunities.name: APPLY: Indie Promo Circuit
opportunities.request_description:
Our Indie Promo Circuit is a marketing & opportunity platform designed specifically for Indie Talent in mind. Allowing each individual participate to have their talents seen, heard & curated with the opportunity to perform Live via IPC-Cam Connect or Live on stage at various studio venues. Participants will be selected from their submissions & will have the chance to“GET EXPOSURE”-“GET BOOKED”- “GET PAID” from global industry opportunities. The IPC is brought to you by Indie Movement - Club 47 Recording / ASCAP Publishing, and is open to ALL GENRES OF MUSIC and ENTERTAINMENT TALENTS. 

All participates are allowed to submit two (2) audition tracks and or videos. The participates selected will either be booked for upcoming performance gigs with some gigs offering compensation ranging from $50 - $1,000 or Free Major Promotional Exposure. Other offers include; Record Deals, Distribution Deals, Magazine Article Write-Up, Radio/TV Airplay & or Studio/Rehearsal Time. As well as Audio/Video Placement, Licensing, Publishing & Compilation Album/DVD Deals. Information will be posted on our website, explaining the benefits offered for each opportunity. 

For the participates that were not selected; could be chosen by our Industry Rep & receive Talent Development. We assist the talent by providing development training, studio / rehearsal time & other valuable resources to help prepare the talent for upcoming opportunities.

Our events & auditions will be filmed & streamed to over 100K viewers, as well as in front of crowds up to 5,000+ in attendance. Selected participates will be featured on our Compilation Album & DVD series. This includes worldwide major distribution for the series to over 200+ digital retail providers through The Orchard and ASCAP Publishing through Indie Movement / Club 47 Recording, reaching an audience of over 100 Million+. 

We also assist the talent with a Bio (Digital EPK) and a Promotional “Talent” Website Landing Page (When Applicable). We/re offering an incredible opportunity for a variety of talented participates. From indie artist, musicians, bands, cover bands, comedians, magicians, dance groups, dj’s, improv comedy acts, solo artist, music producers & the like from ALL OVER THE WORLD. 

If your looking to make a name for yourself in the music & entertainment industry, the time is now. We’ve collaborated with major & independent music & entertainment industry professionals to offer valuable and extremely tangible assistance, advice, industry deals and solid performance opportunities. Your submission will be seen, heard, curated, as well as provided honest feedback & make adjustments to your submissions (When applicable).

Our Events will be filmed, streamed and submitted to Major Networks to be televised & for syndication possibilities. Our event will be Promoted Through Major Network Radio & TV Ads, Internet TV & Radio, Websites, Social Media, Magazine Exposure & more, totaling over 80 Million+. Reaching a combined total audience of over 180 Million+. 

We’re offering an incredible opportunity for;
-Indie artist
-Musicians
-Bands
-Cover bands
-Solo artist, 
-Groups
-Music producers
-Magicians
-Dance groups 
-DJ’s 
and more from ALL GENRES OF MUSIC & TALENT.
opportunities.request_opportunity_description: Our Indie Promo Circuit; is open to ALL GENRES OF MUSIC & TALENT. All participates are allowed to submit tracks and or videos.  As well as Audio/Video Placement, Licensing, Publishing & Compilation Album/DVD Deals. Information will be posted on our website, explaining the benefits offered for each opportunity. For the participates who were not selected for the gig/opportunity; it means we either have all slots filled and or your talents may need some development training. If so; you could be chosen by our Industry Rep & receive Talent Development Coaching. We assist the talent by providing development coaching, studio/rehearsal time & other valuable resources to help prepare the talent for upcoming opportunities.
opportunities.request_band_description: We’re offering an incredible opportunity for;-Indie artist-Musicians-Bands-Cover bands-Solo artist, -Groups-Music producers-Magicians-Dance groups -DJ’s and more from ALL GENRES OF MUSIC & TALENT.
opportunities.request_selection_description: Participates will be selected & either be booked for upcoming performance gigs (some gigs offer compensation ranging from $50 - $1,000) or offered Promotional Exposure. Other offers include; Record Deals, Distribution Deals, Magazine Article Write-Up, Radio/TV Airplay & or Studio/Rehearsal Time. Many of the events & auditions will be filmed and streamed to over 100K viewers, as well as in front of crowds ranging up to 5,000+ in attendance. Selected talent will be featured on our IPC compilation album & DVD series. This includes worldwide major distribution for our IPC audio & video series to over 200+ digital retail providers through The Orchard and ASCAP Publishing through Indie Movement / Club 47 Recording, reaching an audience of over 100 Million+.
opportunities.description: If you're looking to make a name for yourself in the music industry and also do it to help fight against lupus, this is your chance. We're offering local talent a chance to be seen, heard, curated and receive honest feedback, with an opportunity to perform live on stage. We've collaborated with major & independent music industry professionals to offer you valuable and extremely tangible industry assistance and solid performance opportunities. Apply now and come network and perform amongst rising stars in America.

opportunities.name: The Quintessence Coalition
opportunities.request_description:
Immersive Experiences & Conscious Collaborations

The Quintessence Coalition brings enthusiasm for crafting dynamic, visually striking and stimulating atmospheres, events, and experiences that encourages participation, nourishes culture, and cultivates good vibrations and wellbeing. Supporting Canadian virtuosities and performances through a multiplicity of creative and concerted endeavors.

Including performances from Allison Crowe (Zack Snyder’s Justice League, Army of the Dead), Brad Weber (Caribou, Pick a Piper, Coy Haste, BisonBison), ZUU (supporting and touring with artists such as Kelis, Rhye, Django Django, and Pumarosa), Johnny Voltik (who graced Glastonbury’s Shangri-La stage and who has supported and toured with such acts as Busta Rhymes, NERD, and Damien Marley), Sean Boots (of the Amateur Lovers who were signed with Loosegroove Records; Stone Gossard of Pearl Jam), Lindsey Alley (All New Mickey Mouse Club; starring alongside JC Chasez of NSYNC, and Keri Russell), and mystic, artist and writer White Owl Mystic (Elfie Kalfakis, whose adult-picture book entitled, Butterfly: A Tale of Misogyny and Systemic Abuse and White Owl Mystic Arcana, has been sold all around the world). Airing on Rogers TV (The Tom Green Show).

ART & design, food & music, people & spaces

On Rogers TV. Saturday’s at 8:30 pm.

Available on Rogers TV and On Demand.

opportunities.promoter_group_short_description: Afternoon Tea brings enthusiasm for crafting dynamic, visually striking and stimulating atmospheres, and experiences that encourages participation, nourishes culture, and cultivates good vibrations and wellbeing. Supporting artistic virtuosities and performances through a multiplicity of creative and concerted endeavors.
opportunities.promoter_group_talent_roster: Allison Crowe (Zack Snyder’s Justice League, Army of the Dead), Brad Weber (Caribou, Pick a Piper, Coy Haste, BisonBison), ZUU (supporting and touring with artists such as Kelis, Rhye, Django Django, and Pumarosa), Johnny Voltik (who graced Glastonbury’s Shangri-La stage and who has supported and toured with such acts as Busta Rhymes, NERD, and Damien Marley), Sean Boots (of the Amateur Lovers who were signed with Loosegroove Records; Stone Gossard of Pearl Jam), Lindsey Alley (All New Mickey Mouse Club; starring alongside JC Chasez of NSYNC, and Keri Russell), and mystic, artist and writer White Owl Mystic (Elfie Kalfakis, whose adult-picture book entitled, Butterfly: A Tale of Misogyny and Systemic Abuse and White Owl Mystic Arcana, has been sold all around the world). Airing on Rogers TV (The Tom Green Show).

opportunities.name: Afternoon Tea Artist Collective + Record Label
opportunities.request_comments: Afternoon Tea brings enthusiasm for crafting dynamic, visually striking and stimulating atmospheres, and experiences that encourages participation, nourishes culture, and cultivates good vibrations and wellbeing. Supporting artistic virtuosities and performances through a multiplicity of creative and concerted endeavors.
opportunities.request_description:
◉ Born of the Shun Club. Shunned since 2012. ◉
#AvantGarde #SmallButMighty

Afternoon Tea is an independent music record label/artist collective based in Hamilton, ON.

Our aim is to support and promote emerging and established artists.
